definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be out of humour, vexed; be enraged (Aram. zz9ap rage against, [[זְעַף]] to storm, [[זַעֲפָא]] storm; cf. Sam. z9p blow, breathe)—
be out of humour Ge 40:6 (E); dejected, of face Da 1:10; sq. [[עַל]] Pr 19:3 fret against (AV).
be enraged (late: cf. Aram. above) 2Ch 26:19; sq. [[עִם]] v:2Ch 26:19.
